Course Description: REVIEW AND REINFORCEMENT OF THE FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING CYCLE.  DECISION MAKING AND THE INTEGRATION OF DECISIONS INTO THE ORGANIZATIONS STRUCTURE (INCLUDING CONTROL STRUCTURE), STRATEGIES, AND OBJECTIVES.  APPLICATIONS INCLUDE ISSUES IN DECENTRALIZED ORGANIZATIONS, COST BEHAVIOR, BUDGETING, COST ESTIMATES, TACTICAL DECISION-MAKING, PERFORMANCE MOTIVATION AND ASSESSMENT, AND COST-VOLUME-PROFIT ANALYSIS.
